name: Devil of Destiny
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 50 - Delay the inevitable

Devil of Destiny

The Devil has broken free from his chains and has been ravaging the universe in search of the 6 Crystals of Eternity. He now has all but one crystal, which you happen to possess. With no means of using it however, you must do all you can to buy the rest of the world time to prepare before all Hell breaks loose. The Devil is rapidly gaining power, there is no winning this fight. You're only delaying the inevitable.

Gameplay

Devil of Destiny is a boss fight game where your only objective is to survive for as long as possible. The Devil cannot be killed, and his attacks grow stronger and faster. Shooting him will stall his power gain, giving you an extra edge in order to survive for longer. Feel free to post your best time in the comments!

Controls

  • Movement - WASD
  • Sprint - Shift
  • Slide - Ctrl
  • Jump - Space
  • Shoot - Left Mouse
  • Reload - R

Developers notes

I kinda bit off more than i could chew with this one. The fight feels a bit barebones, if i had more time i would've added more attacks. Might *actually* make a post jam version this time. I also apologize to everyone who doesn't get the movie reference that inspired this whole idea.
